DOC.brief_summary: The objective study rule great 10 % incidence hypersensitivity Vitrase follow single intradermal injection 3 USP unit Vitrase . Less equal 10 % hypersensitivity response consider acceptable .
DOC.criteria: Avoid disallow med throughout study Known hypersensitivity hyaluronidase and/or bee sting Atopic individual assess med history Topical/systemic corticosteroid within 30 day Concurrent use antihistamine antiinflammatory study Active chronic disease likely affect immune function History alcohol/drug abuse within 6 month
